description:
Create beautiful travel books

1. Update your private blog on-the-go 
2. Share it day by day with your friends online 
3. Get your printed photobook in just a few clicks.

It is the best way to keep your travel memories alive. 

The app works 100% offline, no data roaming, 

It also includes 340 FREE TRAVEL GUIDES.

• Journal your trips and weekend live on your iPhone, offline.

• In one click, send the mobile content to your online account on mobilytrip.com, to let your circles (friends, family...) follow you.

• Order a printed copy of your journal in just a few clicks when you get back.

Features : 
☆ Amazing trip journaling
record your path, localize the places you visit, illustrate them with photos and comments. Everything offline.

☆ Share your trip
When you have access to internet, sync you device with mobilytrip.com. Your circles will be notified (by Email, Facebook and/or Twitter) and can follow you online. You can manage your privacy settings very easily. 

☆ Your travel memories
In a few clicks, you can receive a truly gorgeous photobook. 
It will allow you to keep the most living memory of your trip. No more hours spent organizing your photos, everything has already been done live !

☆ Add photos taken with any camera
Of course, you can add any photo to your journal online.

☆ Create journals from past trips
You just need to have geolocalized pictures on your iPhone. Import them into the app, classify them into places and you'll relive your trips as if you were there.

☆ Need a travel guide?
MobilyTrip offers 340 guides, each of them containing a map and the list of important places to visit, illustrated with photos and detailled description. New York City, London, Paris, Rome, Barcelona, ​​... but also Vancouver, Perth, Sofia ...

☆ Data roaming
The application works 100% offline, the map is embedded so you won't have any charges abroad
trackCensoredName: Travel Journal & Guide with offline map (London, Paris, New York, Barcelona, Hong Kong, Bangkok, Singapore ...)

releaseNotes:
♥ Get a printed photobook (available August 2013).

› Journals can be private.

› You can relocalize places manually

› You can install it on a Wifi iPad

› design improvements

› stability improvements

Happy travels !
